name: Raccoon Rubbish Removalists
description:
Raccoon Rubbish Removalists is a 1-4 player chaotic and competitive couch co-op party game about trash animals breaking into houses to scavenge, fight and steal to collect the most garbage.

PLAY AS A RACCOON, OPOSSUM, HONEY BADGER, OR SKUNK!

WATCH THE TRAILER HERE:

https://vimeo.com/manage/videos/759809516

PROJECT LEADER + PROGRAMMER - Tenika Altena

2D ARTIST - Sheridyn Robinson

ENVIRONMENT CONCEPT + PROPS PLACER - Renz Balbastro
